xwikidoc.name: Rights
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.LudovicDubost
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.LudovicDubost
xwikidoc.content:
1 Rights Status
[View guest rights>$doc.fullName] - [View user right>>$doc.fullName?user=XWiki.curriki] [View editor rights>$doc.fullName?user=XWiki.monstress] - [View admin rights>$doc.fullName?user=XWiki.jmarks]
#if(!$request.user) #set($user = "XWiki.XWikiGuest") #else #set($user = $request.user) #end {table} Space | User | View | Edit | Comment | Link #foreach($space in $xwiki.spaces) #if(($request.withcoll=="1")||(!$space.startsWith("Coll_"))) $space | ${user} | $xwiki.hasAccessLevel("view", $user, "${space}.WebHome") | $xwiki.hasAccessLevel("edit", $user, "${space}.WebHome") | $xwiki.hasAccessLevel("comment", $user, "${space}.WebHome") | Edit Rights | View History #end #end {table}
